item.description:
Red Sox vs. Atlanta Braves (game starts at 4:00pm)
Lets meet at the Yawkey Way Red Sox store, and be sure we are in proper Red Sox attire! Then we will head out for beverages before and during the game. Some of the great establishments we will visit include Cask 'N Flagon, Boston Beer Works, Who's On First, and of course Jillian's with maybe even some bowling after the game!

I recommend the train for your venture in and safe return. Another good way is to drive to Riverside and then take the Green line in. If you choose to drive, parking should not be a problem as this is an away game.

Please indicate in RSVP if you like join me on the train.

If your running late and don't think you'll be at the Yawkey store by 2:20, please call 508-415-0590 so we can arrange to meet you elsewhere.
item.name: Red Sox Game & Pub Crawl
